item.title: Equinor Backs Orsted Share Sale Despite Trump Targeting Wind
item.description: Equinor ASA will spend almost $1 billion backing Orsted A/S’s share sale, in a crucial show of support as the Danish firm seeks to steady its finances following the Trump’s administration’s attacks on

item.description: Equinor ASA will spend almost $1 billion backing Orsted A/S’s share sale, in a crucial show of support as the Danish firm seeks to steady its finances following the Trump’s administration’s attacks on

item.title: Equinor Plans to Back Orsted Rights Issue to Keep 10% Share
item.description: Equinor ASA said it intends to subscribe for new shares in wind developer Orsted A/S, the first major investor after the Danish government to back the sale.
